content: पद् {vI.v} {c10c} <ab>A.</ab> (पदयते) To go or move. {vII.v} {c4c} <ab>A.</ab> (पद्यते, पन्न; {%<ab>caus.</ab>%} पादयति-ते; {%<ab>desid.</ab>%} पित्सते) {@--1@} To go, move. {@--2@} To go to, approach (with <ab>acc.</ab>). {@--3@} To attain, obtain, gain; ज्योतिषामाधिपत्यं च प्रभावं चाप्यपद्यत <ls>Mb.</ls> {@--4@} To observe, practice; स्वधर्मं पद्यमानास्ते <ls>Mb.</ls> {@--5@} <ab>Ved.</ab> To fall down with fatigue. {@--6@} <ab>Ved.</ab> To perish. {@--7@} To fall out. {vIII.v} {c1c} <ab>P.</ab> (पदति) To stand fast or fixed.

पद् {%<ab>m.</ab>%} [पद्-क्विप्] (This word has no forms for the first five inflections; it is optionally substituted for पद after <ab>acc.</ab> dual) {@--1@} A foot. {@--2@} A quarter, a fourth part (as of a stanza).
